verses.verse: אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which הָיָ֧ה <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> The word יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to יִרְמְיָ֥הוּ <WH3414> which came to Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֖יא <WH5030> the prophet עַל־ <WH5921> concerning הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> against the Gentiles

לְמִצְרַ֗יִם <WH4714> Against Egypt עַל־ <WH5921> concerning חֵ֨יל <WH2428> against the army פַּרְעֹ֤ה נְכוֹ֙ <WH6549> of Pharaohnecho מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become עַל־ <WH5921> concerning נְהַר־ <WH5104> which was by the river פְּרָ֖ת <WH6578> Euphrates בְּכַרְכְּמִ֑שׁ <WH3751> in Carchemish אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הִכָּ֗ה <WH5221> smote נְבֽוּכַדְרֶאצַּר֙ <WH5019> which Nebuchadrezzar מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king בָּבֶ֔ל <WH894> of Babylon בִּשְׁנַת֙ <WH8141> year הָֽרְבִיעִ֔ית <WH7243> in the fourth לִיהוֹיָקִ֥ים <WH3079> of Jehoiakim בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יֹאשִׁיָּ֖הוּ <WH2977> of Josiah מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah
עִרְכ֤וּ <WH6186> Order מָגֵן֙ <WH4043> ye the buckler וְצִנָּ֔ה <WH6793> and shield וּגְשׁ֖וּ <WH5066> and draw near לַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> to battle

אִסְר֣וּ <WH631> Harness הַסּוּסִ֗ים <WH5483> the horses וַֽעֲלוּ֙ <WH5927> and get up הַפָּ֣רָשִׁ֔ים <WH6571> ye horsemen וְהִֽתְיַצְּב֖וּ <WH3320> and stand forth בְּכ֥וֹבָעִ֑ים <WH3553> with [your] helmets מִרְקוּ֙ <WH4838> furbish הָֽרְמָחִ֔ים <WH7420> the spears לִבְשׁ֖וּ <WH3847> [and] put on הַסִּרְיֹנֹֽת׃ <WH5630> the brigandines

מַדּ֣וּעַ <WH4069> Why רָאִ֗יתִי <WH7200> Wherefore have I seen הֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> They חַתִּים֮ <WH2844> them dismayed נְסֹגִ֣ים <WH5472> [and] turned אָחוֹר֒ <WH268> back וְגִבּוֹרֵיהֶ֣ם <WH1368> and their mighty יֻכַּ֔תּוּ <WH3807> are beaten down וּמָנ֥וֹס <WH4498> apace נָ֖סוּ <WH5127> and are fled וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> Without הִפְנ֑וּ <WH6437> and look not back מָג֥וֹר <WH4032> [for] fear מִסָּבִ֖יב <WH5439> [was] round about נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

אַל־ <WH408> Nor יָנ֣וּס <WH5127> flee away הַקַּ֔ל <WH7031> Let not the swift וְאַל־ <WH408> Nor יִמָּלֵ֖ט <WH4422> escape הַגִּבּ֑וֹר <WH1368> nor the mighty man צָפ֙וֹנָה֙ <WH6828> toward the north עַל־ <WH5921> and יַ֣ד <WH3027> by נְהַר־ <WH5104> the river פְּרָ֔ת <WH6578> Euphrates כָּשְׁל֖וּ <WH3782> they shall stumble וְנָפָֽלוּ׃ <WH5307> and fall

מִי־ <WH4310> Who זֶ֖ה <WH2088> is this כַּיְאֹ֣ר <WH2975> as a flood יַֽעֲלֶ֑ה <WH5927> Who [is] this [that] cometh up כַּנְּהָר֕וֹת <WH5104> the rivers יִֽתְגָּעֲשׁ֖וּ <WH1607> are moved מֵימָֽיו׃ <WH4325> whose waters

מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> Egypt כַּיְאֹ֣ר <WH2975> like a flood יַֽעֲלֶ֔ה <WH5927> riseth up וְכַנְּהָר֖וֹת <WH5104> like the rivers יִתְגֹּ֣עֲשׁוּ <WH1607> are moved מָ֑יִם <WH4325> and [his] waters וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and he saith אַֽעֲלֶה֙ <WH5927> I will go up אֲכַסֶּה־ <WH3680> [and] will cover אֶ֔רֶץ <WH776> the earth אֹבִ֥ידָה <WH6> I will destroy עִ֖יר <WH5892> the city וְיֹ֥שְׁבֵי <WH3427> and the inhabitants בָֽהּ׃

עֲל֤וּ <WH5927> Come up הַסּוּסִים֙ <WH5483> ye horses וְהִתְהֹלְל֣וּ <WH1984> and rage הָרֶ֔כֶב <WH7393> ye chariots וְיֵצְא֖וּ <WH3318> come forth הַגִּבּוֹרִ֑ים <WH1368> and let the mighty men כּ֤וּשׁ <WH3568> the Ethiopians וּפוּט֙ <WH6316> and the Libyans תֹּפְשֵׂ֣י <WH8610> that handle מָגֵ֔ן <WH4043> the shield וְלוּדִ֕ים <WH3866> and the Lydians תֹּפְשֵׂ֖י <WH8610> that handle דֹּ֥רְכֵי <WH1869> [and] bend קָֽשֶׁת׃ <WH7198> the bow

וְֽהַיּ֨וֹם <WH3117> For this [is] the day הַה֜וּא <WH1931> he לַאדֹנָ֧י <WH136> of the Lord יְהוִ֣ה <WH3069> GOD צְבָא֗וֹת <WH6635> of hosts י֤וֹם <WH3117> a day נְקָמָה֙ <WH5360> of vengeance לְהִנָּקֵ֣ם <WH5358> that he may avenge מִצָּרָ֔יו <WH6862> him of his adversaries וְאָכְלָ֥ה <WH398> shall devour חֶ֙רֶב֙ <WH2719> and the sword וְשָׂ֣בְעָ֔ה <WH7646> and it shall be satiate וְרָוְתָ֖ה <WH7301> and made drunk מִדָּמָ֑ם <WH1818> with their blood כִּ֣י <WH3588> for זֶ֠בַח <WH2077> hath a sacrifice לַאדֹנָ֨י <WH136> for the Lord יְהוִ֧ה <WH3069> GOD צְבָא֛וֹת <WH6635> of hosts בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> country צָפ֖וֹן <WH6828> in the north אֶל־ <WH413> by נְהַר־ <WH5104> by the river פְּרָֽת׃ <WH6578> Euphrates

עֲלִ֤י <WH5927> Go up גִלְעָד֙ <WH1568> into Gilead וּקְחִ֣י <WH3947> and take צֳרִ֔י <WH6875> balm בְּתוּלַ֖ת <WH1330> O virgin בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt לַשָּׁוְא֙ <WH7723> in vain [הִרְבֵּיתִי כ] (הִרְבֵּ֣ית <WH7235> abundance ק) רְפֻא֔וֹת <WH7499> medicines תְּעָלָ֖ה <WH8585> [for] thou shalt not be cured אֵ֥ין <WH369> There לָֽךְ׃

שָׁמְע֤וּ <WH8085> have heard גוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> The nations קְלוֹנֵ֔ךְ <WH7036> of thy shame וְצִוְחָתֵ֖ךְ <WH6682> and thy cry מָלְאָ֣ה <WH4390> hath filled הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the land כִּֽי־ <WH3588> one גִבּ֤וֹר <WH1368> for the mighty man בְּגִבּוֹר֙ <WH1368> against the mighty כָּשָׁ֔לוּ <WH3782> hath stumbled יַחְדָּ֖יו <WH3162> together נָפְל֥וּ <WH5307> [and] they are fallen שְׁנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH8147> both פ

הַדָּבָר֙ <WH1697> The word אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> that the LORD אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <WH3414> to Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֑יא <WH5030> the prophet לָב֗וֹא <WH935> should come נְבֽוּכַדְרֶאצַּר֙ <WH5019> how Nebuchadrezzar מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king בָּבֶ֔ל <WH894> of Babylon לְהַכּ֖וֹת <WH5221> [and] smite אֶת־ <WH853> אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

הַגִּ֤ידוּ <WH5046> Declare בְמִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> ye in Egypt וְהַשְׁמִ֣יעוּ <WH8085> and publish בְמִגְדּ֔וֹל <WH4024> in Migdol וְהַשְׁמִ֥יעוּ <WH8085> and publish בְנֹ֖ף <WH5297> in Noph וּבְתַחְפַּנְחֵ֑ס <WH8471> and in Tahpanhes אִמְר֗וּ <WH559> say הִתְיַצֵּב֙ <WH3320> ye Stand fast וְהָכֵ֣ן <WH3559> and prepare לָ֔ךְ כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אָכְלָ֥ה <WH398> shall devour חֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> thee for the sword סְבִיבֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5439> round about

מַדּ֖וּעַ <WH4069> Why נִסְחַ֣ף <WH5502> [men] swept away אַבִּירֶ֑יךָ <WH47> Why are thy valiant לֹ֣א <WH3808> not עָמַ֔ד <WH5975> ? they stood כִּ֥י <WH3588> because יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> not because the LORD הֲדָפֽוֹ׃ <WH1920> did drive

הִרְבָּ֖ה <WH7235> He made many כּוֹשֵׁ֑ל <WH3782> to fall גַּם־ <WH1571> Indeed נָפַ֞ל <WH5307> fell אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> yea one אֶל־ <WH413> against רֵעֵ֗הוּ <WH7453> upon another וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> and they said ק֣וּמָה ׀ <WH6965> Arise וְנָשֻׁ֣בָה <WH7725> and let us go again אֶל־ <WH413> against עַמֵּ֗נוּ <WH5971> to our own people וְאֶל־ <WH413> against אֶ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> and to the land מֽוֹלַדְתֵּ֔נוּ <WH4138> of our nativity מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> from חֶ֥רֶב <WH2719> sword הַיּוֹנָֽה׃ <WH3238> the oppressing

קָרְא֖וּ <WH7121> They did cry שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> there פַּרְעֹ֤ה <WH6547> there Pharaoh מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> of Egypt שָׁא֔וֹן <WH7588> [is but] a noise הֶעֱבִ֖יר <WH5674> he hath passed הַמּוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> the time appointed

חַי־ <WH2416> [As] I live אָ֙נִי֙ <WH589> I נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the King יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> [is] the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts שְׁמ֑וֹ <WH8034> whose name כִּ֚י <WH3588> Surely כְּתָב֣וֹר <WH8396> Surely as Tabor בֶּֽהָרִ֔ים <WH2022> [is] among the mountains וּכְכַרְמֶ֖ל <WH3760> and as Carmel בַּיָּ֥ם <WH3220> by the sea יָבֽוֹא׃ <WH935> [so] shall he come

כְּלֵ֤י <WH3627> your baggage גוֹלָה֙ <WH1473> exile עֲשִׂ֣י <WH6213> furnish לָ֔ךְ יוֹשֶׁ֖בֶת <WH3427> dwelling בַּת־ <WH1323> O thou daughter מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> in Egypt כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For נֹף֙ <WH5297> for Noph לְשַׁמָּ֣ה <WH8047> shall be waste תִֽהְיֶ֔ה <WH1961> will become וְנִצְּתָ֖ה <WH3341> and desolate מֵאֵ֥ין <WH369> else יוֹשֵֽׁב׃ <WH3427> without an inhabitant ס

עֶגְלָ֥ה <WH5697> heifer יְפֵֽה־ פִיָּ֖ה <WH3304> [is like] a very fair מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> Egypt קֶ֥רֶץ <WH7171> [but] destruction מִצָּפ֖וֹן <WH6828> of the north בָּ֥א <WH935> cometh בָֽא׃ <WH935> it cometh out

גַּם־ <WH1571> Also שְׂכִרֶ֤יהָ <WH7916> Also her hired men בְקִרְבָּהּ֙ <WH7130> [are] in the midst כְּעֶגְלֵ֣י <WH5695> bullocks מַרְבֵּ֔ק <WH4770> of her like fatted כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For גַם־ <WH1571> even הֵ֧מָּה <WH1992> like הִפְנ֛וּ <WH6437> for they also are turned back נָ֥סוּ <WH5127> [and] are fled away יַחְדָּ֖יו <WH3162> together לֹ֣א <WH3808> did not עָמָ֑דוּ <WH5975> they did not stand כִּ֣י <WH3588> For י֥וֹם <WH3117> because the day אֵידָ֛ם <WH343> of their calamity בָּ֥א <WH935> was come עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> upon עֵ֥ת <WH6256> upon them [and] the time פְּקֻדָּתָֽם׃ <WH6486> of their visitation

קוֹלָ֖הּ <WH6963> The voice כַּנָּחָ֣שׁ <WH5175> like a serpent יֵלֵ֑ךְ <WH1980> moves כִּֽי־ <WH3588> like בְחַ֣יִל <WH2428> with an army יֵלֵ֔כוּ <WH1980> move וּבְקַרְדֻּמּוֹת֙ <WH7134> against her with axes בָּ֣אוּ <WH935> and come לָ֔הּ כְּחֹטְבֵ֖י <WH2404> as hewers עֵצִֽים׃ <WH6086> of wood

כָּרְת֤וּ <WH3772> They shall cut down יַעְרָהּ֙ <WH3293> her forest נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD כִּ֖י <WH3588> Surely לֹ֣א <WH3808> will no יֵֽחָקֵ֑ר <WH2713> though it cannot be searched כִּ֤י <WH3588> though רַבּוּ֙ <WH7231> because they are more מֵֽאַרְבֶּ֔ה <WH697> than the grasshoppers וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> without לָהֶ֖ם <WH1992> like מִסְפָּֽר׃ <WH4557> number

הֹבִ֖ישָׁה <WH3001> shall be confounded בַּת־ <WH1323> The daughter מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt נִתְּנָ֖ה <WH5414> she shall be delivered בְּיַ֥ד <WH3027> into the hand עַם־ <WH5971> of the people צָפֽוֹן׃ <WH6828> of the north

אָמַר֩ <WH559> saith יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> The LORD צְבָא֜וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel הִנְנִ֤י <WH2005> I am going פוֹקֵד֙ <WH6485> Behold I will punish אֶל־ <WH413> about אָמ֣וֹן <WH527> multitude מִנֹּ֔א <WH4996> of No וְעַל־ <WH5921> and פַּרְעֹה֙ <WH6547> and Pharaoh וְעַל־ <WH5921> and מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> and Egypt וְעַל־ <WH5921> with אֱלֹהֶ֖יהָ <WH430> with their gods וְעַל־ <WH5921> and her מְלָכֶ֑יהָ <WH4428> and their kings וְעַ֨ל־ <WH5921> even פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> even Pharaoh וְעַ֥ל <WH5921> and הַבֹּטְחִ֖ים <WH982> and [all] them that trust בּֽוֹ׃
